%dw 2.0 import modules::pharma output application/json var schema = pharma::getSchema(attributes.queryParams.customer_name, p('database.wms.blueyonder.schema'),p('database.wms.mega.schema')) --- "SELECT car_move.CAR_MOVE_ID carga ,trlr.trlr_id equipo_transporte_id , trlr.dispatch_dte fecha_despacho ,shipment.ship_id envio ,ord.ordnum orden ,ord_line.ordlin linea ,all_inventory_view.prtnum ,prtdsc.lngdsc descripcion ,sum (all_inventory_view.untqty) cantidades ,shipment_line.pckgr1 monto ,altprt_sat.alt_prtnum clavesat ,decode(prtmst.hazmat_flg, 0, 'NO', 'SI') peligroso, prtmst.ltlcls clave_peligroso ,sum (prtftp_dtl.grswgt * all_inventory_view.untqty )pesoxarticulo FROM "++ schema ++".car_move LEFT JOIN "++ schema ++".trlr ON car_move.trlr_id = trlr.trlr_id AND trlr.trlr_cod = 'SHIP' JOIN "++ schema ++".stop ON stop.car_move_id = car_move.car_move_id JOIN "++ schema ++".shipment ON shipment.stop_id = stop.stop_id AND shipment.shpsts <> 'B' JOIN "++ schema ++".shipment_line ON shipment.ship_id = shipment_line.ship_id AND shipment.wh_id = shipment_line.wh_id AND shipment_line.linsts <> 'B' LEFT JOIN "++ schema ++".all_inventory_view ON shipment_line.ship_line_id = all_inventory_view.ship_line_id and trlr.trlr_id = all_inventory_view.stoloc JOIN "++ schema ++".ord_line ON shipment_line.ordnum = ord_line.ordnum AND shipment_line.ordlin = ord_line.ordlin AND shipment_line.wh_id = ord_line.wh_id AND shipment_line.client_id = ord_line.client_id JOIN "++ schema ++".ord ON ord.ordnum = ord_line.ordnum AND ord.wh_id = ord_line.wh_id AND ord.client_id = ord_line.client_id JOIN "++ schema ++".prtmst ON all_inventory_view.prtnum = prtmst.prtnum AND all_inventory_view.prt_client_id = prtmst.prt_client_id AND prtmst.wh_id_tmpl = 'AVIOR-27'
LEFT JOIN "++ schema ++".alt_prtmst altprt_sat ON all_inventory_view.prtnum = altprt_sat.prtnum AND all_inventory_view.prt_client_id = altprt_sat.prt_client_id AND altprt_sat.alt_prt_typ = 'SAT'
/* Huella pieza */
LEFT JOIN "++ schema ++".prtftp_dtl ON all_inventory_view.wh_id = prtftp_dtl.wh_id AND all_inventory_view.prtnum = prtftp_dtl.prtnum AND all_inventory_view.ftpcod = prtftp_dtl.ftpcod AND prtftp_dtl.uomlvl = 0 LEFT JOIN "++ schema ++".prtdsc ON prtdsc.colnam = 'prtnum|prt_client_id|wh_id_tmpl' AND prtdsc.colval = all_inventory_view.prtnum || '|' || all_inventory_view.prt_client_id || '|' || all_inventory_view.wh_id WHERE 1=1 and car_move.CAR_MOVE_ID = :load GROUP BY car_move.CAR_MOVE_ID ,trlr.trlr_id , trlr.dispatch_dte ,shipment.ship_id ,ord.ordnum ,ord_line.ordlin ,all_inventory_view.prtnum ,prtdsc.lngdsc ,shipment_line.pckgr1 ,altprt_sat.alt_prtnum ,prtmst.hazmat_flg ,prtmst.ltlcls ,prtftp_dtl.grswgt"
